testcase.name: Test to submit the details in Transformation-Change page and verify the details
testcase.system-out: Given Open the Mottomac website.............................................passed When Click on the Mott Homepage.............................................passed Then HomePage is displayed..................................................passed Given Click on the "Digital" section........................................passed And Click on the "Services" link............................................passed And Scroll to the Transformation "Change" section...........................passed When click on the Transformation "Change" section...........................passed And Enter the first name as "Vijay".........................................passed And Enter the Surname as "Chukka"...........................................passed And Enter the Email address as "Vijayachukka@gmail.com".....................passed And Select the Service as "Select all" from dropdown list...................passed When click on the Send now button...........................................passed Then Form should be submitted successfully..................................passed
